original_title: Carter Price and The Gem of Kings
overview: Carter Price is getting close to finding the lost gem of kings, with the help of his old friend Jonah Debret. However when he runs into Mike Martin things take a turn for the worst, Carter Price can't trust anyone. Strap in for this fun Indiana Jones style adventure.
tagline: Adventure has only one name...and it's name is Carter Price
title: Carter Price and The Gem of Kings
